SEARCH
Package net.chaossquad.mclib.scheduler

Klasse WrappedTaskScheduler

java.lang.Object
net.chaossquad.mclib.scheduler.WrappedTaskScheduler
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
Removable, SchedulerInterface
public final class WrappedTaskScheduler extends Object implements SchedulerInterface, Removable
A scheduler that uses another scheduler to schedule its tasks with a specific remove condition and name.
This removes the need to manually add the same remove condition for many tasks in the same context.
Practical example: A ManagedEntity has its own WrappedTaskScheduler which is linked to the game's TaskScheduler. When the entity is dead, all tasks of it will be removed because of the remove condition of this task scheduler.
